name: Coona: Eternal Slumber
description:
Coona: Eternal Slumber

Follow Coona through her adventure to save her friend and discover mysterious things about herself!

What will she find out?

Description:

Beautiful atmospheric story-based platformer!

Controls:

- Movement:  [A]  [D] or [<] [>]

- Jump: [W] or [^]

- Interact: E

- That's it  :)

Download Instructions (Optional):

- Download the zipped folder

- Extract its components

- Open the file named "Coona Eternal Slumber"

- Play!

Credits to GrafxKid and Ansimuz for the graphics!
